headline: Robinhood to enter Indonesia with brokerage, crypto trader acquisition
summary: Robinhood Markets will acquire Indonesian brokerage firm Buana Capital Sekuritas and licensed digital asset trader Pedagang Aset Kripto, ​marking the retail trading platform's entry into one of Southeast Asia's ‌major crypto hubs, the company said in a blog post on Sunday.  Indonesia is among the ‌world's leading adopters of cryptocurrency, backed by supportive regulation and a tech-savvy young population, making it a prime target for U.S. firms seeking growth in Asia.  The country has more than 19 million capital market investors and 17 million ⁠cryptocurrency traders, underscoring its appeal ‌for both stock and digital asset trading.

content.title: Robinhood to enter Indonesia with brokerage, crypto trader acquisition

Indonesia is among the ‌world's leading adopters of cryptocurrency, backed by supportive regulation and a tech-savvy young population, making it a prime target for U.S. firms seeking growth in Asia.  The country has more than 19 million capital market investors and 17 million ⁠cryptocurrency traders, underscoring its appeal ‌for both stock and digital asset trading.

headline: How Recent Moves Are Rewriting the Growth Story for Robinhood
summary: Robinhood Markets stock is back in focus after analysts nudged their fair value estimate higher to $151.55 from $151.14 per share, while trimming the discount rate slightly to 8.45% from 8.46% as confidence in the company’s long term trajectory improves. Behind these small but notable adjustments is a growing belief that the MIAXdx joint venture, surging prediction market revenues, and a faster pace of product innovation can support more durable growth, even as long run revenue expectations...

headline: Carvana Stock Rallies—And May Have Further to Go Before Joining the S&P 500
summary: Carvana and two other stocks rallied on Monday after the news that they will join the S&P 500 this month.  The online-car retailer, Irish building-materials supplier CRH and ventilation contractor Comfort Systems USA (FIX) will enter the benchmark as part of its quarterly rebalancing, S&P Dow Jones Indices said late Friday.  Carvana shares were up 12% in midday trading, setting an intraday record at about $450.

content.title: Carvana Stock Rallies—And May Have Further to Go Before Joining the S&P 500
content.summary: Carvana and two other stocks rallied on Monday after the news that they will join the S&P 500 this month.  The online-car retailer, Irish building-materials supplier CRH and ventilation contractor Comfort Systems USA (FIX) will enter the benchmark as part of its quarterly rebalancing, S&P Dow Jones Indices said late Friday.  Carvana shares were up 12% in midday trading, setting an intraday record at about $450.

headline: Robinhood Expands Reach in Asia With Indonesia Acquisition
summary: Robinhood  Markets said on Monday morning that it has agreed to acquire PT Buana Capital Sekuritas, an Indonesian brokerage, and PT Pedagang Aset Kripto, an Indonesian digital financial asset trader.  The acquisitions will further Robinhood’s international expansion efforts.  The brokerage firm didn’t disclose terms of the deal, which is expected to close in the first half of 2026.

content.title: Robinhood Expands Reach in Asia With Indonesia Acquisition
content.summary: Robinhood  Markets said on Monday morning that it has agreed to acquire PT Buana Capital Sekuritas, an Indonesian brokerage, and PT Pedagang Aset Kripto, an Indonesian digital financial asset trader.  The acquisitions will further Robinhood’s international expansion efforts.  The brokerage firm didn’t disclose terms of the deal, which is expected to close in the first half of 2026.
